2005.context: Wayfair Inc. is a e-commerce company for home goods focused on online furniture, decor, and home improvement products. CSN Stores early online furniture retailer.

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: E-commerce giant expanding into home goods

competitors.name: Overstock
competitors.notes: Deep discounts on furniture and home goods

competitors.name: IKEA
competitors.notes: Swedish furniture retailer with growing US presence

competitors.name: Bed Bath & Beyond
competitors.notes: Home goods retailer with online presence

competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Retail giant with growing e-commerce

competitors.name: Target
competitors.notes: Mass retailer with home furnishing focus

competitors.name: Pier 1 Imports
competitors.notes: Home decor specialty retailer
